main_features.name: Web Scraping Engine
main_features.description: Scrapes convocatorias from the EU website, validates URLs and links, handles pagination, extracts basic data, and scrapes detailed pages for PDFs.

main_features.name: Database Management
main_features.description: Manages a PostgreSQL database with tables like 'calls' to store convocatoria details.

main_features.name: API Endpoints
main_features.description: Provides an API for accessing and managing convocatoria data, including endpoints for creating, updating, and retrieving tasks.

main_features.name: Dashboard
main_features.description: Monitors system status, provides statistics on scraping, displays analysis results, and offers direct links to recommended tenders.

technical_stack: SQLAlchemy with PostgreSQL for database management

priority_order.reason: Foundation for data collection and is critical for the project's success.
Necessary to store and manage the scraped data efficiently.
Enables interaction with the system programmatically, essential for automated processes and integrations.
Provides a user-friendly interface for monitoring and accessing the system's data.
